title: Ticket #4059: DAG-level NOOP jobs shouldn't need submit file if using workflow log
description:
I believe that DAG-level NOOP jobs will fail if the specified submit file doesn't exist. If you're using the default/workflow log file, I don't think that should be the case, because I think the only reason we needed a submit file was to know what log file to write the fake events to.

I guess step 1 is to verify that a missing submit file really will cause the DAG to fail; if that's the case, step 2 would be to fix it.

Also see #3843.
remarks:
2017-May-17 10:19:39 by wenger:
This isn't true (at least, not anymore), so I'm going to mark this ticket as abandoned.
creator: wenger
